verses.verse: The priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, even all the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, shall have no portion <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with Israel <S%H3478><s%>: they shall eat <S%H398><s%> the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>, and his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
And they shall have no inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as he hath spoken unto them <S%H1696><s%>.

And this shall be the priests <S%H3548><s%>' due <S%H4941><s%> from the people <S%H5971><s%>, from them that offer <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>, whether it be ox <S%H7794><s%> or sheep <S%H7716><s%>, that they shall give <S%H5414><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%> the shoulder <S%H2220><s%>, and the two cheeks <S%H3895><s%>, and the maw <S%H6896><s%>.

The first-fruits <S%H7225><s%> of thy grain <S%H1715><s%>, of thy new wine <S%H8492><s%>, and of thine oil <S%H3323><s%>, and the first <S%H7225><s%> of the fleece <S%H1488><s%> of thy sheep <S%H6629><s%>, shalt thou give him <S%H5414><s%>.

For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> him out of all thy tribes <S%H7626><s%>, to stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, him and his sons <S%H1121><s%> for ever <S%H3117><s%>.

And if a Levite <S%H3881><s%> come <S%H935><s%> from any <S%H259><s%> of thy gates <S%H8179><s%> out of all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, where he sojourneth <S%H1481><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> with all the desire <S%H185><s%> of his soul <S%H5315><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>;

then he shall minister <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%>, as all his brethren <S%H251><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> do <S%H5975><s%>, who stand there before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
They shall have like portions <S%H2506><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>, besides that which cometh of the sale <S%H4465><s%> of his patrimony <S%H1><s%>.

When thou art come <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H3925><s%>, thou shalt not learn to do <S%H6213><s%> after the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of those nations <S%H1471><s%>.

There shall not be found <S%H4672><s%> with thee any one that maketh his son <S%H1121><s%> or his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire <S%H784><s%>, one that useth <S%H7080><s%> divination <S%H7081><s%>, one that practiseth augury <S%H6049><s%>, or an enchanter <S%H5172><s%>, or a sorcerer <S%H3784><s%>,
or a charmer <S%H2266><s%>, or a consulter <S%H7592><s%> with a familiar spirit <S%H178><s%>, or a wizard <S%H3049><s%>, or a necromancer <S%H1875><s%>.

For whosoever doeth <S%H6213><s%> these things is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and because <S%H1558><s%> of these abominations <S%H8441><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> doth drive them out <S%H3423><s%> from before thee <S%H6440><s%>.
Thou shalt be perfect <S%H8549><s%> with Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>.

For these nations <S%H1471><s%>, that thou shalt dispossess <S%H3423><s%>, hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto them that practise augury <S%H6049><s%>, and unto diviners <S%H7080><s%>; but as for thee <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> hath not suffered thee so to do <S%H5414><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will raise up <S%H6965><s%> unto thee a prophet <S%H5030><s%> from the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee <S%H251><s%>, of thy brethren, like unto me <S%H8085><s%>; unto him ye shall hearken;

according to all that thou desiredst <S%H7592><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Let me not hear <S%H8085><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, neither let me see <S%H7200><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> any more <S%H4191><s%>, that I die not.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H3190><s%>, They have well said that which they have spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

I will raise them up <S%H6965><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%>, like unto thee <S%H5414><s%>; and I will put my words <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto them all that I shall command him <S%H6680><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H376><s%>, that whosoever will not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto my words <S%H1697><s%> which he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in my name <S%H8034><s%>, I will require it of him <S%H1875><s%>.

But the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, that shall speak <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> presumptuously <S%H2102><s%> in my name <S%H8034><s%>, which I have not commanded <S%H6680><s%> him to speak <S%H1696><s%>, or that shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, that same prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%>.
And if thou say <S%H559><s%> in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, How shall we know <S%H3045><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath not spoken <S%H1696><s%>?

when a prophet <S%H5030><s%> speaketh <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, if the thing <S%H1697><s%> follow not <S%H935><s%>, nor come to pass, that is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath not spoken <S%H1696><s%>: the prophet <S%H5030><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> it presumptuously <S%H2087><s%>, thou shalt not be afraid of him <S%H1481><s%>.
